title: NEED HELP FOR XP BOOST
body:
Hi, I am from Garena. I have been playing NA server for a half year,  but it seems to be quite hard for me to get level 30 because of lacking of time. So I am wondering if you guys have some code for XP boost or show me how to buy it ( I couldn't find the XP Boost in Store).

Please help me, thanks.

replies.body: Hey there, we don't currently offer free boosts but you can find them on the client store page.  They are available under Store -> Gameplay -> Boosts radio button on the left side.  I hope that helps!
